Title: Amends the list of persons eligible to succeed the governor in the event that the governor is unable to discharge the powers and duties of the office of governor
Summary: Amends the list of persons eligible to succeed the governor in the event that the governor is unable to discharge the powers and duties of the office of governor as a result of an attack or a natural or peacetime disaster and the lieutenant governor, the temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly are unable to discharge such duties.
LawSection: New York State Defense Emergency Act
LawCode: Amd Art 1-A ยง5, Chap 784 of 1951
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state defense emergency act, in relation to persons eligible to succeed the governor
